allow: Bash(ssh martin@192.168.100.5 "echo ''=== HOSTNAME ==='' && hostname && echo ''=== OS ==='' && cat /etc/os-release 2>/dev/null | head -5 && echo ''=== BLUETOOTH STATUS ==='' && systemctl status bluetooth 2>/dev/null | head -10 && echo ''=== BT INSTALLED ==='' && which bluetoothctl 2>/dev/null && echo ''=== AUDIO ==='' && pactl list sinks short 2>/dev/null || pipewire --version 2>/dev/null || echo ''no pulseaudio/pipewire'' && echo ''=== RUNNING SERVICES ==='' && systemctl list-units --type=service --state=running --no-pager | grep -iE ''kiosk|chrome|chromium|xorg|display|pulse|pipe|blue|attack'' && echo ''=== ACTIVE DISPLAY ==='' && DISPLAY=:0 xdotool getactivewindow getwindowname 2>/dev/null || echo ''could not get active window''")
